author: Daniel Greene
description:

Just click here: https://gruns.co/pages/first-order?utm_source=pi&utm_term=2124529 FROM, the MGM+ horror mystery series, throws viewers into a terrifying town that no one can escape, filled with monsters, psychological torment, and endless unanswered questions. But does the show deliver on its mysteries, or is it just another series that raises more questions than answers?

In this spoiler-free (for most of the video) review, I break down what makes FROM such a compelling watch. If you love creepy small-town horror, intense character-driven storytelling, and mind-bending mysteries, this show might be for you. But be warned—FROM isn’t afraid to leave you in the dark.

🔪 What I Discuss In This Review:
✔️ The Premise – What FROM is all about & why it’s so unsettling
✔️ The Mystery – Does the show actually provide answers?
✔️ The Monsters – Some of the creepiest horror creatures on T
title: FROM – The Best Horror Show You’re NOT Watching (And Why You Should)
